Name: Rescuer
About the game: Martin, a science-loving priest, arrives in the Rutianland region, meets people and begins to become influential in the area. Afterwards, many people call him savior in the small village, and then he realizes that there are conditions to establish a plan that has a long domain of data, to have the economic and warlike of a region, and then, he begins to attack military and civilians in the region, many empires are creating their own empire. The region then becomes known as ZPriot and Jacob creates a resistance team and tries to face Martin's growth in the region. Can you master Rutianland? Find out in Rescuer!! 1 - Knowing the region 2 - Conflicts 3 - Export point 4 - Point defense 5 - Extermination 2 rifles Equipment for rifles Pistol Smoke grenade Explosive grenade Customizations (Muffler, scope, flashlight) Collectibles available on the map. Customizable weapons The Rutianland region is scattered with details, items and easter eggs. Explore, discover, have fun! Master everything in Rescuer!
